## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (0f285f6202227757b1ae10391ea069ae841e5b19a58529e5ce7b0f0a37e48c91)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@expressions/excel-functions' @ 3.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
